meta.title: Life Manual | 17 Gon Play
meta.description: Life Manual is your personal strategy command center—combining Bazi Five Elements, Ziwei Dou Shu, and 2026 monthly flow signals to help you plan your rhythm and make clearer decisions.

home.heroHeadline: A Strategic Map for Real Life.
home.heroSubheadline: Built on Ziwei and Bazi. Designed as a modern decision system.
home.heroSupporting: Ancient structure, translated into practical strategy.
home.heroSubtitle: Enter your birth details to open your personal Life Manual.
home.helperUnsureTime: Not sure of your birth time?
home.feature1Body: Understand how your Life Palace and Five-Phase balance shape your decisions.
home.feature2Body: Major cycles. Minor limits. Monthly flow signals.
home.feature3Body: Push when aligned. Hold when necessary.

ziwei.boardSubtitle: The Life Palace sits at the center; surrounding palaces align with the mainstream chart layout.
ziwei.strategyPanelSub: Three-harmony and opposition palaces marked: this palace + opposite + three-alliance (four total).
ziwei.tipRotation: Tip: Palace positions rotate based on the Life Palace branch. Three-harmony and opposition = this + opposite + three-alliance (click to auto-mark).
ziwei.emptyPalaceNote: An empty palace does not mean no events; the key is how three-harmony and flow-month rhythm activate it.
ziwei.clickPalaceHint: Click any palace on the Ziwei chart to see details and star explanations.
ziwei.dataUnavailable: Ziwei data temporarily unavailable (backend error). Please try again later.

palaceStrengthDesc.財帛: Your wealth flow and money logic
palaceStrengthDesc.疾厄: Your physical foundation and health base
palaceStrengthDesc.遷移: Your external interface and social image
palaceStrengthDesc.官祿: Your career momentum and execution drive
palaceStrengthDesc.福德: Your mental resilience and inner balance

ziwei.rotationTip: Tip: Palace positions rotate based on the Life Palace branch; triads and oppositions are auto-highlighted.
ziwei.subjectiveFocusHint: Primary structural focus this year. Higher variance expected.

ui.formSubtitle: Enter your birth info to unlock your life manual
ui.shichenNote: Note: Shichen is converted to a representative time for calculation.
ui.myChartsHint: Click a chart to load and recalculate; max 5.
ui.myChartsEmpty: No charts yet. Enter birth info below and click "Save to My Charts".
ui.loadError: Load failed. Please refresh the page.
ui.loadErrorDetail: Load failed. Please refresh (calc.js not loaded).
ui.langSwitchHint: Page will reload. Re-enter birth data and calculate to update the chart.
ui.levelNoteBase: Structural consolidation. Strengthen core before scaling.

bazi.ziweiQuestion: Ziwei — Can you clear this level?
bazi.sectionDesc: Above: Four Pillars. Below: Surface (Stems) vs Strategic (Stems + Hidden Stems + Month Weight). Wuxing meanings on the right (DB: wuxing_meanings).
bazi.cangganHint: (to understand the source of your strategic five-phase)

flow.monthlyHint: Click a month to expand Ten-God signals and strategy suggestions.

strategic.capturePlaceholder: What are your thoughts on this year's "{{name}} mode"? Any plans or concerns?

consult.ctaHeadline: When structure becomes clear, strategy becomes simple.
consult.ctaSupport: Work directly with Li Bo to analyze your full birth matrix and build a long-term positioning framework.
consult.equipmentQuote: "Equipment (surface) defines your start; power (strategic) defines your finish."

strategy.tacticalDesc: Based on Five-Phase share + Ten-Gods focus, with real-time tips (DB content preferred).
strategy.tacticalNote: Note: This section provides tactical guidance from your command center.

chartLangMismatch.bannerEn: This chart is in Chinese. Recalculate to view English.
chartLangMismatch.bannerZh: 目前命盤不是英文版本，請重新計算。

wuxing.title: Five-Phase Flow Report
wuxing.placeholder: After calculation, your five-phase report will appear here.
wuxing.noReport: No report yet. Complete a calculation first; if the issue persists, check WuxingFlowPipeline.
wuxing.sheetSub: Tap the wuxing radar to expand (content from database: wuxing_meanings)

estimateHour.modalSubtitle: Answer by behavior to estimate candidate shichen; results auto-fill the form.

q1.text: When do you feel most alert and productive? (Pick up to 2)

q2.text: When do you feel most motivated to take action? (Pick up to 2)

q3.text: Ignoring schedules, your natural rhythm is more like?

q4.text: When things get chaotic or stressful, your first reaction is?

q6.text: When deciding, you rely most on?

q7.text: When efficiency is low, you tend to?

q8.text: How do you manage resources (time, money, attention)?

q9.text: When starting something, you’re more like?

q10.text: What matters more in the outcome?

options.B: Willing to carry for important people

q13.text: When starting a task, you’re more like?

q14.text: You care for others more by?

options.E: Let it sit until things calm

q17.text: With new situations or strangers you tend to?

q19.text: Is your peak energy earlier or later than most people?

ceremony.feedbackQuestion: Is this result correct for you?
ceremony.feedbackActualHint: Please select your actual birth shichen
ceremony.子: In the moment the world quiets, you see what others miss; this depth of insight sets you apart.
ceremony.丑: In the moment pressure closes in, you stand firmer and hold longer; this steadiness sets you apart.
ceremony.寅: In the moment before things begin, you are already on the trail; this pioneering force sets you apart.
ceremony.卯: In the moment feelings start to flow, you let others open with ease; this graceful empathy sets you apart.
ceremony.辰: In the moment chaos is about to rise, you see the bigger picture; this vast vision sets you apart.
ceremony.巳: In the moment change lands, you switch to survival mode; this flexibility sets you apart.
ceremony.午: In the moment all eyes gather, you naturally stand in the light; this innate brightness sets you apart.
ceremony.未: In the moment resources accumulate, you quietly turn the barren into form; this grounding power sets you apart.
ceremony.申: In the moment tasks grow complex, you reorganize all logic; this rational precision sets you apart.
ceremony.酉: In the moment details emerge, you spot the gap at a glance; this sharp discernment sets you apart.
ceremony.戌: In the moment a line is crossed, you firmly hold your ground; this principled stance sets you apart.
ceremony.亥: In the moment inspiration flashes, you piece fragments into the whole; this transcendent intuition sets you apart.
